actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount of the deduction allowed for meal and entertainment expenses associated with the performing arts.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the allowable entertainment deduction for a ticket to a legitimate attraction (as defined in this Act) of the performing arts.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount of the deduction allowed for meal and entertainment expenses associated with the performing arts.
